system.description:
You combine a talent for psionics with power granted by a supernatural patron. The precise order in and means by which you contracted these powers can vary. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Intelligence score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • You may change your warlock spellcasting ability to Intelligence if it is not already. Once made, this choice is permanent.
  • When you would learn Noetics or @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.o1ed6xk84ghmzmdo]{Secrets of Arcana}, you may choose freely from either list.
  • If you use Mind Strike and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.ulmcmf3ofmpzmgzf]{Eldritch Blast} in the same turn, you gain temporary hit points equal to your proficiency bonus.
  • You can apply the Range psionic augment to @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.845tsci8556w0o6x]{Eldritch Ray}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.gd79c49oej8xagdv]{Eldritch Disturbance}, or @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.e7zwh5ljkuffrm7k]{Eldritch Whip}. You can apply the Harm psionic augment to any version of eldritch blast you possess.
system.prerequisite: 3 levels in esper, 3 levels in warlock
